channel.title: Somones got to know this question!
channel.description:
Ok wel i download the exrendum source, but the drops are pvp random style.
Even if ur pking, in bh or whaterver its all random.
How would i chage the drops to what u have on?
Msn- Graff_is_art@hotmail.com
Thanks

item.title: Somones got to know this question!
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

yeh go to playerhandler.java find pvp take out all the codes for drops coz its random drops so take em out to it drops wut it has too

Read full topic

item.title: Somones got to know this question!
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

lol easy easy easy, all you do it go to the file npcdrops.cfg and there should be a bunch of monster ids and numbers beside it (those are the item’s id) all you need to do it find the id of the monster and the id of them item and put the item’s id in
